sentences.sContent: That sums up the concept of authenticity.
sentences.sContent_eng: That sums up the concept of authenticity.
sentences.sCn: 这句话概括了真实性的概念。

sentences.sContent: What caused your authenticity to be compromised?
sentences.sContent_eng: What caused your authenticity to be compromised?
sentences.sCn: 是什么导致你的真实性妥协掉了？

sentences.sContent: They want your death as a warranty for the authenticity of your beliefs.
sentences.sContent_eng: They want your death as a warranty for the authenticity of your beliefs.
sentences.sCn: 他们希望你的死亡就像一种对于你所信仰的真实性的保证。

synos.tran: 真实性，[法]确实性；可靠性

trans.tranOther: the quality of being real or true
